text: Lakers' Austin Reaves (calf) back in action against Nets - ESPN
fullText: Austin Reaves, sidelined the past five weeks with a strained left calf, returned in the Lakers' 125-109 win against the Nets on Tuesday night, scoring 15 points on 3-for-9 shooting with four rebounds and two steals.

text: China bans hidden car door handles, which can trap people after crashes - NPR
fullText: China has introduced new regulations, starting in 2027, requiring all car doors to open manually from both sides. Electric door handles can malfunction in a crash or battery failure.
